Hero.desc: With a degree in computer engineering, I design and develop innovative and mobile applications.

symfonyProject.title: Symfony Ecom App
symfonyProject.desc: To test my skills, I created my own e-commerce site with Symfony 7

githreadsProject.title: Githreads
githreadsProject.desc: Application that displays a stream of posts that users can like and comment on, once they've authenticated with Github. Developed with Next.js and React.

taskProject.title: Task Management Webservice
taskProject.desc: Task management webservice that lets a client connect to it to create, read, update and delete tasks. Designed with Node.js, Express.js and MongoDB.

gameOfLifeProject.title: The game of Life
gameOfLifeProject.desc: Conway's Game of Life simulation. Developed with React and Next.js.

chatbotProject.title: Chatbot
chatbotProject.desc: Chatbot that uses the Chatsonic API to respond to prompts. Developed with React.

vLilleProject.title: vLille Search Project
vLilleProject.desc: Application that displays the status of the V'Lille bike stations in Lille. Developed with React.

pingProject.title: Ping stability test
pingProject.desc: Application that lets you test the stability of your ping over time to a remote host. Designed with Next.js and React.

backend.title: Web backend development
backend.desc: I develop backend solutions solutions, designed for scalable, long-lasting software.

frontend.title: Web frontend development
frontend.desc: I create dynamic, responsive and user-friendly interfaces optimized for a fluid and engaging user experience.

automation.title: Automation
automation.desc: I love developing task automation that improve efficiency and productivity, while saving time for users.

data.title: Data processing
data.desc: Extracting, manipulating, processing, analyzing and interpreting data are some of the components I enjoy.

security.title: Security
security.desc: As the security of digital systems is a fundamental concern, I make sure that the solutions I develop are protected.
